department.ch: 學習與教學研究所碩士班

goal.ch:
1.瞭解課程設計的重要理論基礎與教學效果。
2.實際演練「課程發展」所需的步驟與教學計畫。
goal.en:
1.Through a careful literature review, the students will be able to plan, design, and evaluate non-traditional classrooms. 
2.By learning the practical techniques and ideas which have implemented successfully by 100 award-winning teachers in the Compendium of Suggestions for Teaching with Excellence in the University of Berkeley, students will be able to adopted to wide range of classroom settings.

outline.ch:
1.教育心理學融入課程與教學
2.博物館參訪與各式教學法結合之跨領域課程設計
3.學習目標之訂定
4.課程發展的層級與模式
5.課程組織與課程實施之概要
6.教學目標、教學策略與評量工具之契合
7.兩性教育融入課程模式的設計概要
8.拼圖式合作學習法
9.十二種評量工具
10.情意教學的設計概要與體驗
11.學習歷程檔案之內在價值與典範呈現
outline.en:
1. Integrating educational psychology into curriculum and teaching
2. Interdisciplinary curriculum design combining museum visits and various teaching methods
3. Setting learning goals
4. Levels and modes of curriculum development
5. Outline of course organization and course implementation
6. The fit of teaching objectives, teaching strategies and assessment tools
7. Outline of Design of Gender Education Integrating Curriculum Model
8. Puzzle-style cooperative learning
9. Twelve Assessment Tools
10. Design outline and experience of affection teaching
11. Intrinsic value and exemplary presentation of learning process files

textbook.ch:
1. Brookfield, S. D. and Preskill, S. (1999). Discussion as A Way of Teaching: Tools and Techniques for Democratic Classrooms. San Francisco: Jossey-Bass Higher and Adult Education Series.
2. Davis, B. G. (2001). Tools for Teaching. San Francisco: Jossey-Bass Higher and Adult Education Series.
3. McKeachie, W. J. and Svinicki, M. (2006) Teaching Tips. Ma: Houghton Mifflin Co.
4. 自編講義
textbook.en:
1. Brookfield, S. D. and Preskill, S. (1999). Discussion as A Way of Teaching: Tools and Techniques for Democratic Classrooms. San Francisco: Jossey-Bass Higher and Adult Education Series.
2. Davis, B. G. (2001). Tools for Teaching. San Francisco: Jossey-Bass Higher and Adult Education Series.
3. McKeachie, W. J. and Svinicki, M. (2006) Teaching Tips. Ma: Houghton Mifflin Co.
